items.title: A bullish breakout in this little-known pharma stock is forming, charts show
items.description: Frank Cappelleri of CappThesis breaks down the bullish technical backdrop for this pharma-related stock.

items.title: Oracle reports its earnings after Wednesday’s bell. Here’s what analysts expect
items.description: Analysts seem optimistic on Oracle, with several raising their price targets heading into its earnings report.

items.title: This ride-sharing giant is a buy and can surge more than 25%, Stifel says
items.description: The investment bank initiated shares of the ride-hailing platform with a buy rating.

items.title: Jefferies upgrades First Solar as 'only game in town' due to looming import restrictions
items.description: The Senate appears likely to pass legislation that would phase out tax credits for companies that receive materials from some foreign suppliers.

items.title: GameStop share valuation is still just relying on 'greater fools' theory, says Wedbush
items.description: "GameStop has consistently capitalized on the existence of 'greater fools' willing to pay more than twice its asset value for its shares," an analyst ...
